\begin{description}
\item[{This is a very simple simulation of}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
a laboratory

\item {} 
with many Petri dishes

\item {} 
containing bacterial populations.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}


\chapter{Simulation and Laboratory}
\label{\detokenize{sim_and_lab:simulation-and-laboratory}}\label{\detokenize{sim_and_lab::doc}}

\section{The simulation module}
\label{\detokenize{sim_and_lab:module-biolab.simulation}}\label{\detokenize{sim_and_lab:the-simulation-module}}\index{biolab.simulation (module)}
Implements a complete simulation.
\index{Sim (class in biolab.simulation)}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{sim_and_lab:biolab.simulation.Sim}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{biolab.simulation.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{Sim}}}{\emph{n\_dishes}, \emph{n\_a}, \emph{n\_b}, \emph{seed}, \emph{p\_dth=0.1}, \emph{p\_div=0.1}}{}
Define and perform a simulation.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{n\_dishes}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} number of Petri dishes in lab

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{n\_a}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} number of bacteria of type A per dish

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{n\_b}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} number of bacteria of type B per dish

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{seed}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} random seed

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{p\_dth}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}) \textendash{} death probability per cycle

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{p\_div}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}) \textendash{} division probability per cycle

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{run() (biolab.simulation.Sim method)}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{sim_and_lab:biolab.simulation.Sim.run}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{run}}}{\emph{cycles}, \emph{report\_cycles=1}, \emph{return\_counts=False}}{}
Run simulation for given number of cycles.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{cycles}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} number of cycles to simulate

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{report\_cycles}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} interval between status information updates (== 0: no output)

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{return\_counts}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} if True, return population counts

\end{itemize}

\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
If return of counts is requested, a tuple (cycle, nA, nB)

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
None or tuple

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}

\section{The bacteria module}
\label{\detokenize{dish_and_bacteria:module-biolab.bacteria}}\label{\detokenize{dish_and_bacteria:the-bacteria-module}}\index{biolab.bacteria (module)}

\begin{fulllineitems}

Bacteria which die and multiply with fixed probabilities.

Create bacterium with age 0.
